intent_atoms.description: Deployment targets in the Tuist manifest must be lowered to support iOS and macOS app builds.
Wrap iOS 17-only SwiftUI APIs (`onChange(initial:)`, `ContentUnavailableView`, focusable) in helpers that fall back to older equivalents.
Use `.foregroundColor` instead of `.foregroundStyle` so colour styling compiles on iOS 16 and macOS 13.
Verify `xcodebuild` for ISOInspectorApp-iOS (simulator) and ISOInspectorApp-mathematical? Wait...

functional_units.name: iOS and macOS App Build Restoration
functional_units.description: Restores the ability to build iOS and macOS applications after deployment target changes in the Tuist manifest.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI API Compatibility Helpers
functional_units.description: Provides helper wrappers for iOS 17-only SwiftUI APIs (onChange(initial:), ContentUnavailableView, focusable) that fall back to older equivalents when running on earlier OS versions.

functional_units.name: Foreground Style Compatibility Fix
functional_units.description: Replaces .foregroundStyle usage with .foregroundColor to ensure colour styling compiles on iOS 16 and macOS 13.

functional_units.name: Build Verification for ISOInspectorApp
functional_units.description: Verifies successful builds of ISOInspectorApp-iOS (simulator) and ISOInspectorApp-macOS using xcodebuild, and verifies swift build for the project.
